title: SnoBoss 26 in. Snow Shovel
description: Built to last through even the most extreme conditions, the True Temper SnoBoss 26 in. high-capacity blade with steel wear strip allows for the removal of more snow in less time. The poly blade is designed to hold more loads of snow than average shovel capacities. The blade shape features a flat front end for pushing snow and slush while the deep back end is shaped to scoop snow. By flipping the blade over you can also scrape off areas like steps and porches. The handle is ergonomically designed with multiple areas for hand placement. Get more leverage using the foot placement area as you shovel.
